title: full screen in game
body: Everything seems normal in the client and champion select but as soon as i go to the loading screen after locking in the champion (where it usually goes full screen) it doesnt and then in game i cant get it to go full screen either , please help asap :){{summoner:4}}

replies.body: After champion select, your network has to transition over to the game servers.  It sounds like your connection is going dormant in between and not establishing comms.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for troubleshooting steps to get it fixed.  Let me know if you have any questions.
